alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 9:18AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LOWER KEYS IN MONROE COUNTY THROUGH 945 AM EST... At 917 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm approaching the Lower Keys, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 45 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Coppitt Key, Niles Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Saddlebunch Keys, Geiger Key, Shark Key, Little Torch Key, Upper Sugarloaf Key, Middle Torch Key, and Little Palm Island Resort. This includes US 1 between mile markers 10 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
